articles.content: NASA recently posted a breath-taking picture of Butterfly Nebula in honour of American Astronomer Dr Nancy Grace Roman, also known as "Mother of Hubble". The Butterfly Nebula, observed by Hubble in w… [+716 chars]

articles.title: Saturn gets crown back for most moons in solar system - Down To Earth Magazine
articles.description: Jupiter has once again ceded the title of “most known moons” to Saturn, after 62 new Saturnians moons were discovered, taking the grand total to 145. Jupiter had taken over the title in February 23 after its official total moons had gone up to 95.
articles.content: Saturn has regained its crown as the planet with the most moons in the solar system, just months after being overtaken by its fellow gas giant Jupiter. Sixty-two new moons of the planet were discover… [+1452 chars]
